name: Muscularis Propria Invasion
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward

concept.display: T3: Colon/rectum tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or the nonperitonealized pericolic or perirectal soft tissues (finding)
T3c,d: Colon/rectum tumor invades >5 mm beyond the border of the muscularis propria (finding)
pT3: Tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum) (finding)

pT3c,d: Tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues, invades greater than 5 mm beyond the border of the muscularis propria (colon/rectum) (finding)
